üìú About me

I am Computer Engineering Student attending Memorial University in Newfoundland. I am currently a fourth year student with a cumulative GPA of 3.8/4.0.

I am an aspiring software developer with over 16 months of internship experience. My roles in these internships have ranged from fullstack development, to leading development on a template enclosure generator that is accessed as a REST API. I have also been able to gain more software development experience through my many side projects, in which I have built versatile automated webscrapers, built games in the Unity game engine, and have built multiple websites in both plain Javascript and Reactjs

My personal interests include game development, machine learning, Esports, and studying financial markets.
